text: Palladin (Russian: Палладин, Ukrainian: Палладін) is a Slavic masculine surname originating from the Greek Pallas, its feminine counterpart is Palladina. It may refer to: *Aleksandr Palladin (1885–1972), Ukrainian biochemist *Vladimir Palladin (1859–1922), Russian biochemist and botanist, father of Aleksandr ==References==
title: Palladin (surname)
